title: Patch Notes
content: you open the Transcribe Scroll to Spellbook UI. Also moved the position of your party's gold amount so it isn't shown twice. Pressing both controller triggers at the same time should now open the Shortcut Radial Menu and hide the Party Line. The 'More Details' button on the Examine panel will now work even if tooltips are disabled. Fixed the 'Place in World' function not always working properly.
